subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Yes, this is again a clear one. :)

I guess this file had no cue markers in it, right?
So it also seems to work with random fragments rather than allophones.
BTW, to avoid the clicks, try "X-Cross".

Stefan

Now good night to you all, it's almost 3:00 AM here at my location
(although I'm not tired at all - but I have to go to work in a few
hours...)

--
